original_text: He was very hungry. He wanted to eat the bits of food that the rich man threw away. Even the dogs came and they tasted the sores on his body.
korean_text: 그 부자의 상에서 떨어지는 것으로 배불리려 하매 심지어 개들이 와서 그 헌데를 핥더라

sentences.original_text: He wanted to eat the bits of food
that the rich man threw away.
and they tasted the sores on his body.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그의 몸에 있는 상처를 핥았습니다.
